plot outline: This multi-layered family thriller is set against the idyllic backdrop of Chittazha, a mountainous terrain in Idukki where bamboo reeds flourish. After much wandering from place to place, Balraman (Mohanlal), a lorry driver who lost his wife (Sneha), has finally settled down with his daughter (Ananya) at Chittazha. Peace evades him as his dark past catches up with him, and Balaraman has to take risky methods to safeguard his own life and that of his daughter's.
title: Shikkar
plot: A lorry Driver who was a police officer tries to protect his daughter from an unknown man who is hunting them.
